Description: Beautiful recently renovated 2 bedroom. Hardwood floors throughout. Huge in eat-in kitchen. Dishwasher/Disposal. Near Alewife Station - walk to Red Line. Very close to East Arlington stores and restaurants. Parking for 2 small to medium sized cars. Coin-op laundry in basement. 1 year lease. Last month's rent. 1/2 month rental fee. Email only to see.
